channel.title: ScapeArchives.net is BACK!
channel.description:
Scapearchives.net is back!! We had 400 members in two days after RuneStatus died, then the main owner as I was co-owner he shut site down and went to prison for smoking weed....So the other day he got on msn finally and sold it to me!! I have no revived it and it is back a great private server community it is already gaining members fast! We do need some mods and admins so PM me if you want a position but I must somewhat know you or have heard good things about you and you must post non spam and be active!
www.scapearchives.net !!!YEY!
